sections.code:
#divGoBack, #divGoNext, .lo-container
    { display: none ! important; }

.share, #comp-pattern-library-2, #core-navigation, .tags-container,
    .orb-footer-inner, #comp-features-and-analysis, .related-links,
    #comp-top-stories-promo, .player-with-placeholder__caption,
.navigation, #orb-header, .comments-button, [class^="primary-nav"],
[class^="secondary-nav"], .sp-media-asset, .story-share, #get-inspired
    { display : none ! important; }
.preformatted { white-space:pre ! important;}

/* what a weird way to manage a page... */
  p, a { visibility: unset ! important; }

/* Links I didn't find useful */
    a[href*="marketintelligencecenter.com"], a[href*="pr-usa.net"],
    a[href*="pr-inside.com"], a[href*="123jump.com"],
    a[href*="forextv.com"], a[href*="tradingmarkets.com"],
    a[href*="blacknews.com"], a[href*="live-pr.com"],
    a[href*="transworldnews.com"], a[href*="medscape.com"],
    a[href*="foxbusiness.com"], a[href*="thestreet.com"],
    a[href*="sys-con.com"], a[href*="twst.com"],
    a[href*="menafn.com"], a[href*="ad-hoc-news.de"],
    a[href*="prminds.com"], a[href*="gurufocus"],
    a[href*="marketoracle.co.uk"], a[href*="businesswire.com"],
    a[href*="benzinga.com"], a[href*="istockanalyst.com"],
    a[href*="investorplace.com"], a[href*="mysmartrend.com"],
    a[href*="investors.com"], a[href*="courant.com"],
    a[href*="piqqem.com"], a[href*="earthtimes.org"],
    a[href*="emailwire.com"], a[href*="cnanalyst.com"],
    a[href*="msn.com"], a[href*="tradershuddle.com"],
    a[href*="articleant.com"], a[href*="lexology.com"],
    a[href*="schaeffersresearch.com"], a[href*="zacks.com"],
    a[href*="chartpoppers"], a[href*="tapebeat"],
    a[href*="wallstreetbay"], a[href*="efreepressrelease"],
    a[href*="americanbankingnews"], a[href*="savvystockpicks"],
    a[href*="stockbling"], a[href*="galaxystocks"],
    a[href*="etfchannel"], a[href*=".sbwire.com"],
    a[href*="4-traders.com"], a[href*="northforkvue.com"],
    a[href*="jutiagroup"], a[href*="tickerreport.com"],
    a[href*="aaaresearchreports"], a[href*="aaaaa"], a[href*="aaaaa"],
    a[href*="aaaaa"], a[href*="aaaaa"]

    { 
        display:none ! important
    }

    .pin
    { 
        height: 8px ! important; 
    }

    .xxnews-item { 
        height: 1.4em; 
    }
.media { display : none ! important;}

/* Listed games will be hidden in Humble's store. Includes:
   Games I've bought, at Humble or elsewhere
   Ones that came in a bundle
   Games I have no interest in buying  */
.hero-banner {
    display: none ! important;
}

sourceCode:
/* ==UserStyle==
@name        GOG
@description Mask out unwanted or owned tiles
@namespace   github.com/maptracker/confFiles
@homepageURL https://github.com/maptracker/confFiles/tree/master/UserCSS
@version     1.0.1
@license     GPL-3.0-or-later
==/UserStyle== */

@-moz-document domain("gog.com") {
    .is-owned { 
        display: none ! important
    }
    .icon-linux { 
        background-color: darkorange ! important;
        margin:3px; 
        border: solid orange 2px;  
    }
    .product-row__rating {
        display: inline ! important; 
        width: 3px ! important;
    }
    .icon-win, .icon-mac, .icon-plus { 
        display: none ! important
    }

    /* #wishlistHolder .invisible { display: block ! important } */
    
    .star-rating--50 { background-color: lime; }
    .star-rating--45 { background-color: green; }
    .star-rating--40 { background-color: yellowgreen; }
    .star-rating--35 { background-color: yellow; }
    .star-rating--30 { background-color: pink; }
    .star-rating--25 { background-color: red; }
    .star-rating--20 { background-color: red; }
    .star-rating--15 { background-color: black; }
    .star-rating--10 { background-color: black; }
    
    /* These attributes are no longer being set */
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="50"] { background-color: lime; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="49"] { background-color: lime; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="48"] { background-color: lime; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="47"] { background-color: green; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="46"] { background-color: green; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="45"] { background-color: green; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="44"] { background-color: yellowgreen; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="43"] { background-color: yellowgreen; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="42"] { background-color: yellowgreen; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="41"] { background-color: yellow; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="40"] { background-color: yellow; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating^="3"] { background-color: pink; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating^="2"] { background-color: red; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating^="1"] { background-color: black; }
    
    /* Owned games from other sources */
    *[product-tile-id="1207659024"], /* botanicula */
    *[product-tile-id="1207659753"], /* vvvvvvvv */

sections.code:
.is-owned { 
        display: none ! important
    }
    .icon-linux { 
        background-color: darkorange ! important;
        margin:3px; 
        border: solid orange 2px;  
    }
    .product-row__rating {
        display: inline ! important; 
        width: 3px ! important;
    }
    .icon-win, .icon-mac, .icon-plus { 
        display: none ! important
    }

    /* #wishlistHolder .invisible { display: block ! important } */
    
    .star-rating--50 { background-color: lime; }
    .star-rating--45 { background-color: green; }
    .star-rating--40 { background-color: yellowgreen; }
    .star-rating--35 { background-color: yellow; }
    .star-rating--30 { background-color: pink; }
    .star-rating--25 { background-color: red; }
    .star-rating--20 { background-color: red; }
    .star-rating--15 { background-color: black; }
    .star-rating--10 { background-color: black; }
    
    /* These attributes are no longer being set */
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="50"] { background-color: lime; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="49"] { background-color: lime; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="48"] { background-color: lime; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="47"] { background-color: green; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="46"] { background-color: green; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="45"] { background-color: green; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="44"] { background-color: yellowgreen; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="43"] { background-color: yellowgreen; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="42"] { background-color: yellowgreen; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="41"] { background-color: yellow; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating="40"] { background-color: yellow; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating^="3"] { background-color: pink; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating^="2"] { background-color: red; }
    .product-row__rating[star-rating^="1"] { background-color: black; }
